name: Reinforced Plating
description: Additional armor plating that provides better protection at the cost of increased weight and reduced mobility.

name: Reactive Coating
description: Special coating that dissipates energy weapon impacts, reducing their effectiveness.

name: Mobility System
description: Servo-assisted joints that improve mobility and reduce the penalty from wearing heavy armor. For powered armor only.

name: Stealth Module
description: Advanced stealth technology that reduces visual, audio, and thermal signatures.

name: Environmental Control
description: Internal systems that provide protection against radiation, extreme temperatures, and toxic environments.

name: Auto-Medic
description: Automated medical system that administers first aid and combat stimulants when the wearer is injured.

name: Targeting Assistance
description: Integrated targeting systems that improve weapon accuracy and target identification.

name: Power Efficiency
description: Advanced power management systems that significantly extend operational time between recharges.

name: Jump Jets
description: Short-burst propulsion systems that allow for enhanced jumping capabilities.

name: Shield Generator
description: Creates an energy shield that absorbs damage until depleted, then requires time to recharge.
